name: Water Elemental
movement: walking speed 30 ft., swimming speed 90 ft.
description: The Water Elemental is a large creature embodying the essence of water, capable of shifting into towering waves or crashing torrents.
memorable: Known for its ability to envelop and drown enemies while regenerating from most physical damage.
goals: Often summoned to serve as guardians or to wreak havoc in battle.
relations: Can be summoned by spellcasters and often associated with aquatic environments.
environment: Commonly found in aquatic environments or guarding sacred bodies of water.
strengths: Resistance to nonmagical damage, immunity to poison and several debilitating conditions.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage, which reduces its speed.
attacks: Can make multiple slam attacks, dealing significant bludgeoning damage and grappling opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Whelm ability that allows it to engulf and restrain creatures within its space.
senses: Lacks keen senses but has darkvision up to 60 feet.
additional_information: Conductive ability transfers lightning damage to others in its space.
Fluid Form allows it to move through cramped spaces effortlessly.
Purify Water ability can cleanse water of poison and disease.
Water Camouflage enhances stealth while submerged.
Elemental Nature allows it to exist without air, food, or sleep.
test_queries: water guardian found in sacred lakes
elemental immune to poison and exhaustion
a water monster with a powerful whelm ability
